text: Ne manye mbu shiosi shiosi shiamulanyoola muliyie ebuleka washio wa kharano ni khulwa Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, nende Abekho nende Abana Abafwilwa nende Abamanani nende Abalikhuluchendo, toto nikali mbu mwasuubila Nyasaye nende akakhweshila khumusumba wefu inyanga yobukabukhasio, inyanga yemikanda chibili chiabukanana, Ne Nyasaye niye mwene obunyali hekulu wa buli eshindu
